value_claims.claim_title: Autonomous haul trucks deployed at Gudai-Darri mine
value_claims.claim_description: Rio Tinto deployed 23 CAT 793F autonomous haul trucks at Gudai-Darri mine, monitored remotely from Operations Centre 1,500 km away in Perth.
value_claims.source_quote: The mine feature autonomous 23 CAT 793F autonomous haul trucks and three CAT MD6310 autonomous drills.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Autonomous trucks directly implement AI-driven navigation and decision-making for mining operations

value_claims.claim_description: Three CAT MD6310 autonomous drills deployed with data-informed modelling to build accurate assessments of ground conditions and improve safety.
value_claims.source_quote: three CAT MD6310 autonomous drills...data-informed modelling from the drills helps to build more accurate assessments of existing ground conditions and improve safety.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Autonomous drills use data-informed modelling and machine learning for ground condition assessment

value_claims.claim_title: Autonomous water carts with intelligent dust suppression
value_claims.claim_description: Autonomous water cart vehicles with intelligent on-board systems detect dry/dusty conditions and trigger water application, enabling digital tracking of water consumption and waste reduction.
value_claims.source_quote: The vehicle's intelligent on-board system detects dry and dusty conditions on site, triggering the application of water to roads to keep them in good condition.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Intelligent system autonomously detects conditions and triggers actions, with digital tracking for optimization

value_claims.claim_title: Digital twin of processing plant for monitoring and VR training
value_claims.claim_description: Full digital replica of processing plant allows teams to monitor and respond to real-time data, with same data used for interactive 3D virtual reality training environment.
value_claims.source_quote: a full digital replica of the processing plant, which allows teams to monitor and respond to data collected from the plant. The same digital asset data is used to provide a feature rich, interactive 3D environment for virtual reality training.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Digital twin uses real-time data analytics and machine learning for monitoring and training optimization

value_claims.claim_title: AGVs in warehouse reduce manual handling and improve safety
value_claims.claim_description: Four automatic guided vehicles (AGVs) automate pallet frame handling with laser obstacle scanners and auto-stop functions, reducing manual handling and improving safety.
value_claims.source_quote: The heavy mobile equipment (HME) warehouse is the home to four automatic guided vehicles (AGVs) designed to automate the handling of pallet frames. The introduction of AGV's to the warehouse will reduce manual handling and improve safety
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AGVs use autonomous navigation with obstacle detection for automated material handling

value_claims.claim_description: Robotics deployed for ore sampling laboratory to optimize mine safety and drive productivity at Gudai-Darri.
value_claims.source_quote: This includes the use of robotics for the ore sampling laboratory as well as for distribution of parts in the new workshop.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Robotics directly automate ore sampling processes for safety and productivity improvements

value_claims.claim_title: $10 million value extracted from lump supply optimization
value_claims.claim_description: Targeted approach using data analytics and real-time visualization to optimize Pilbara Blend lump supply during high premiums extracted approximately $10 million in additional value.
value_claims.source_quote: extracting around US$10 million ($13.47 million) of additional value.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Data analytics and real-time visualization directly enabled market-responsive optimization decisions

value_claims.claim_title: Scheduling time reduced from 3-4 weeks to 48 hours
value_claims.claim_description: Advanced planning system implemented in 2017 reduced scheduling time from 3-4 weeks to 48 hours, enabling response to short-term market signals and maximizing value over volume.
value_claims.source_quote: We implemented this system in 2017 and what used to take three-to-four weeks in scheduling can now be done is 48 hours.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Advanced planning system with scenario analysis directly automated and accelerated scheduling processes

value_claims.claim_title: Machine learning for market prediction and decision-making
value_claims.claim_description: Experimentation with machine learning and predictive analytics to anticipate market conditions and enable better decision-making in sales and marketing operations.
value_claims.source_quote: We are currently experimenting with machine learning and predictive analytics to anticipate market conditions and enable better decision making
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Machine learning directly applied to predict market conditions for improved decision-making

value_claims.claim_title: Digital twin for Koodaideri intelligent mine
value_claims.claim_description: Digital twin replica plant collecting data from design through operation, linked to data lake with analytics and machine learning to drive business outcomes with greater accuracy and speed.
value_claims.source_quote: We are building a replica digital plant that collects all the data on the plant from design, build, commissioning and operation...coupled with analytics and machine learning, will drive business related outcomes in a shorter time and with greater accuracy.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Digital twin explicitly uses analytics and machine learning to optimize operations and drive outcomes

value_claims.claim_title: VR training modules for complex maintenance activities
value_claims.claim_description: Virtual reality modules developed for complex maintenance activities provide highly interactive and engaging training method ensuring better task retention and competency from operators.
value_claims.source_quote: a number of virtual reality modules are being developed...This allows a highly interactive and engaging method of training which ensures better task retention and competency from our operators
value_claims.attribution_evidence: VR training uses digital twin data and simulations, with AI contributing to content generation and adaptation

value_claims.claim_title: Augmented reality for asset health prediction
value_claims.claim_description: Augmented asset health tools using cognitive technology to predict maintenance issues, enabling checking asset condition through augmented reality - next step from predictive maintenance.
value_claims.source_quote: trials of augmented asset health tools, which use cognitive technology to predict problems...Imagine predicting a potential maintenance issue and then being able to check on the asset condition through augmented reality.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cognitive technology directly predicts maintenance issues using AI-driven analysis

value_claims.claim_title: AI-driven dynamic scheduling system for intelligent mines
value_claims.claim_description: Future AI system that learns to adapt schedules based on past experience, integrates customer needs, assesses multiple scenarios instantly, and manages unplanned events using market intelligence.
value_claims.source_quote: Picture a future dynamic system which learns to adapt and change a schedule based on past experience and lessons learned...A system which has the power to assess multiple scenarios to make a decision instantly.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI system explicitly learns from experience and makes autonomous decisions for scheduling optimization

value_claims.claim_title: Real-time ore tracking using sensors on autonomous trucks
value_claims.claim_description: Autonomous trucks implement real-time ore tracking using sensors to provide live dig face progression data for operational optimization.
value_claims.source_quote: The trucks implement real-time ore tracking using sensors to provide live dig face progression
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Sensor data and real-time tracking enable AI-driven operational decisions and optimization

value_claims.claim_title: Real-time data visualization for mine-to-market agility
value_claims.claim_description: Real-time data visualization supported tighter linkages between Pilbara operations and Singapore sales hub, increasing agility from mine to market.
value_claims.source_quote: Real-time data visualisation has supported tighter linkages between our Pilbara operations and our sales and marketing hub in Singapore, increasing our agility from mine to market.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Data visualization contributes to decision-making, with underlying analytics and AI enabling agility improvements

context_claims.claim_description: Rio Tinto is a London-based mining company founded in 1873
context_claims.source_quote: Rio Tinto was founded in 1873...the London-based company

context_claims.claim_title: Iron ore mining in Pilbara region
context_claims.claim_description: Rio Tinto operates iron ore mines in the Pilbara region of Western Australia
context_claims.source_quote: Gudai-Darii, mining company Rio Tinto's most technologically advanced mine, was officially opened today in the Pilbara region of Australia.

context_claims.claim_description: Gudai-Darri mine has expected life of 40+ years with annual capacity of 43 million tons, reaching full capacity in 2023
context_claims.source_quote: With an expected life of more than 40 years and an annual capacity of 43 million tons...The mine is expected to reach capacity in 2023.

context_claims.claim_description: Gudai-Darri development began in April 2019, with over 14 million work hours culminating in delivery of Rio Tinto's 17th iron ore mine
context_claims.source_quote: Since development begun in April 2019, more than 14 million workhours have culminated in the delivery of Rio Tinto's 17th and most technologically advanced iron ore mine in the Pilbara.

context_claims.claim_description: Development supported 3,000+ jobs during construction and design, with operation requiring around 600 permanent roles
context_claims.source_quote: Development of the mine supported more than 3,000 jobs during the construction and design phase with the operation requiring around 600 permanent roles.

context_claims.claim_title: Investment in Western Australia during construction
context_claims.claim_description: A$3.2 billion in goods and services sourced within Western Australia during construction, with A$1.5 billion in contracts to WA-registered businesses
context_claims.source_quote: A total of A$3.2 billion ($2.2 billion U.S.) in goods and services were sourced within Western Australia (WA) during the construction phase of the Gudai-Darri Project with contracts valued at A$1.5 billion.

context_claims.claim_description: Autonomous assets monitored remotely from Rio Tinto's Operations Centre located 1,500 km away in Perth
context_claims.source_quote: These autonomous assets are monitored remotely from Rio Tinto's Operations Centre 1,500 km (932 mi.) away in Perth.

context_claims.claim_description: Gudai-Darri will underpin future production of Rio Tinto's Pilbara Blend product, a specific product combining iron ores from across operations
context_claims.source_quote: Gudai-Darri will underpin future production of Rio Tinto's Pilbara Blend product.

context_claims.claim_title: Mine of the Future program decade old
context_claims.claim_description: Rio Tinto's Mine of the Future program is now decade old, with intelligent mines as likely successor
context_claims.source_quote: is the likely successor to Rio Tinto's now decade old 'Mine of the Future' program.

context_claims.claim_title: Koodaideri first ore delivery planned for 2021
context_claims.claim_description: Koodaideri, the first intelligent mine, set to deliver first tonnes of ore in 2021 subject to regulatory approvals
context_claims.source_quote: The first intelligent mine is set to be Koodaideri, which will deliver its first tonnes of ore in 2021, assuming it meets regulatory approvals.

context_claims.claim_title: Over 100 innovation opportunities assessed for Koodaideri
context_claims.claim_description: Rio Tinto assessing over 100 innovation opportunities to make Koodaideri the first intelligent mine
context_claims.source_quote: We are assessing over 100 innovation opportunities which will make this our first intelligent mine.

context_claims.claim_description: Rio Tinto evolving from traditional push system to market-led supply chain integrating customer orders through to orebody planning
context_claims.source_quote: We are now evolving from a traditional push system to a truly market-led supply chain.

context_claims.claim_title: Sales and marketing hub in Singapore
context_claims.claim_description: Rio Tinto operates sales and marketing hub in Singapore linked to Pilbara operations
context_claims.source_quote: Real-time data visualisation has supported tighter linkages between our Pilbara operations and our sales and marketing hub in Singapore

context_claims.claim_description: Rio Tinto implemented advanced planning system in 2017 that reduced scheduling time from 3-4 weeks to 48 hours
context_claims.source_quote: We implemented this system in 2017 and what used to take three-to-four weeks in scheduling can now be done is 48 hours.

context_claims.claim_description: Solar farm with 83,000 panels will power one-third of Gudai-Darri's operational needs with renewable energy
context_claims.source_quote: Once the new solar farm is complete, it will be able to power one-third of Gudai-Darri's operational needs with renewable energy.
